Name: Animate Bone Fiend
Description: Spell. Creates a level 1...14...17 bone fiend that can attack at range. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Name: Animate Bone Minions
Description: Spell. Creates two level 0...10...12 bone minions. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Name: Barbed Signet
Description: Signet. Target and adjacent foes suffer from Bleeding (3...13...15 seconds).

Name: Barbs
Description: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Target foe takes 1...12...15 damage whenever it takes physical damage.

Name: Blood is Power
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) +3...5...6 Energy regeneration. Cannot self-target.

Name: Blood of the Master
Description: Spell. Heals your undead servants for 30...99...116. Healing cost: +2% Health sacrifice per servant healed.

Name: Chilblains
Description: Spell. Deals 10...37...44 cold damage to foes in the area around your target; removes 1...2...2 enchantment[s] from these foes. You are Poisoned (10 seconds).

Name: Dark Aura
Description: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds). Deals 5...41...50 damage to adjacent foes whenever target ally sacrifices Health. Damage cost: you lose 5...17...20 Health.

Name: Dark Bond
Description: Enchantment Spell. (30...54...60 seconds.) Transfers 75% of incoming damage from you to your nearest servant.

Name: Dark Pact
Description: Spell. Deals 10...40...48 damage.

Name: Death Nova
Description: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals 26...85...100 damage and inflicts Poisoned condition (15 seconds) on adjacent foes if target ally dies.

Name: Deathly Swarm
Description: Spell. Deathly Swarm flies out slowly and deals 30...78...90 cold damage. Hits two additional foes in the area.

Name: Defile Flesh
Description: Hex Spell. (5...29...35 seconds.) Reduces healing target foe receives by 33%. Only skills with word "heal" in description are affected.

Name: Demonic Flesh
Description: Enchantment Spell. (30...54...60 seconds.) When using a skill on a foe
Sacrifice: deal 5...17...20 shadow damage to all other foes adjacent to you.

Name: Enfeebling Blood
Description: Spell. Inflicts Weakness condition (5...17...20 seconds) on this foe and nearby foes.

Name: Enfeebling Blood (PvP)
Description: Spell. Inflicts Weakness condition (1...13...16 second[s]) on this foe and nearby foes.

Name: Faintheartedness
Description: Hex Spell. (3...13...16 seconds.) Target foe attacks 50% slower and has -0...2...3 Health degeneration.

Name: Grenth's Balance
Description: Elite Spell. You gain Health equal to half of difference between you and target
Sacrifice: and this foe loses an equal amount. If this foe has less Health than you
Energy: you lose Health equal to half of difference.

Name: Life Siphon
Description: Hex Spell. (12...22...24 seconds.) Target foe has -1...3...3 Health degeneration. You have +1...3...3 Health regeneration.

Name: Lingering Curse
Description: Elite Hex Spell. (6...25...30 seconds.) Target and nearby foes have -0...2...3 Health degeneration and receive 20% less benefit from healing.

Name: Mark of Pain
Description: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals 10...34...40 damage to adjacent foes whenever target foe takes physical damage.

Name: Order of Pain
Description: Enchantment Spell. Enchants all party members (5 seconds). 3...13...16 more damage whenever these party members hit with physical damage.

Name: Parasitic Bond
Description: Hex Spell. (20 seconds.) Causes -1 Health degeneration. End effect: you are healed for 30...102...120 Health.

Name: Plague Signet
Description: Elite Signet. Transfers all conditions with 100...180...200% of their remaining durations from yourself to target foe. 50% failure chance unless Curses 5 or more.

Name: Plague Touch
Description: Touch Skill. Transfers 1...3...3 condition[s] from yourself to target foe.

Name: Putrid Explosion
Description: Spell. Explodes a corpse
Sacrifice: dealing 24...101...120 damage to foes near it. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Name: Rend Enchantments
Description: Spell. Removes 5...8...9 enchantments from target foe. Removal cost: you lose 55...31...25 Health for each Monk enchantment removed.

Name: Rigor Mortis
Description: Hex Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Target foe cannot block.

Name: Rotting Flesh
Description: Spell. Inflicts Diseased condition (10...22...25 seconds).

Name: Signet of Agony
Description: Signet. Deals 10...58...70 damage to foes near you. You begin Bleeding (25 seconds).

Name: Signet of Agony (PvP)
Description: Signet. Deals 10...58...70 damage to foes near you. You begin Bleeding (25 seconds).

Name: Soul Feast
Description: Spell. You gain 50...234...280 Health. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Name: Soul Taker
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (3...25...30 seconds.) Attacks deal +15...19...20 damage and sacrifice 15...19...20 health. PvE Skill

Name: Strip Enchantment
Description: Spell. Removes 0...2...2 enchantment[s] from target foe. Removal effect: you steal 5...53...65 Health.

Name: Suffering
Description: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near target (6...25...30 seconds). These foes have -0...2...3 Health degeneration.

Name: Tainted Flesh
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (20...39...44 seconds.) Foes who hit target ally in melee become Diseased (3...13...15 seconds); this ally is immune to Disease.

Name: Taste of Death
Description: Spell. Steals 100...340...400 Health from allied undead servant.

Name: Unholy Feast
Description: Spell. Steals 10...54...65 Health from 1...3...4 foe[s] in the area around you.

Name: Unholy Feast (PvP)
Description: Spell. Steals 10...54...65 Health from 1...3...4 foe[s] in the area around you.

Name: Vampiric Gaze
Description: Spell. Steals 18...52...60 Health.

Name: Vile Touch
Description: Touch Skill. Deals 20...56...65 damage.

Name: Weaken Armor
Description: Spell. Also affects adjacent foes. Inflicts Cracked Armor condition (5...17...20 seconds).

Name: Well of Blood
Description: Well Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Allies in this well have +1...5...6 Health regeneration. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Name: Well of the Profane
Description: Well Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Foes in this well lose all enchantments and cannot be target of further enchantments. Exploits a fresh corpse. 50% failure chance unless Death Magic 5 or more.
